title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 114.4 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 114.4 - Location

State Regulations
(a) Records shall
be made available at the main office of the department, which is located at: Two World Trade Center, 32nd Floor, New York, NY 10047. (b) Whenever practicable, records shall be
made available at a regional office most convenient to a data subject. Regional
offices are located at: 194 Washington Avenue, Albany, NY 12210; 1530 Jefferson

Road, Rochester, NY 14623; 333 East Washington Street, Syracuse, NY 13202; and
125 Main Street, Room 415, Buffalo, NY 14203. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
114.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
